verses.verse: Give <S%H238>ear<s%>, O you <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, and I will <S%H1696>speak<s%>; and <S%H8085>hear<s%>, O <S%H776>earth<s%>, the <S%H561>words<s%> of my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.

My <S%H3948>teaching<s%> shall <S%H6201>drop<s%> as the <S%H4306>rain<s%>, my <S%H565>speech<s%> shall <S%H5140>distil<s%> as the <S%H2919>dew<s%>, as the small <S%H8164>rain<s%> upon the tender <S%H1877>herb<s%>, and as the <S%H7241>showers<s%> upon the <S%H6212>grass<s%>:
Because I will <S%H7121>publish<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: <S%H3051>ascribe<s%> you <S%H1433>greatness<s%> unto our <S%H430>God<s%>.

He is the <S%H6697>Rock<s%>, his <S%H6467>work<s%> is <S%H8549>perfect<s%>: for all his <S%H1870>ways<s%> are <S%H4941>judgment<s%>: a <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H530>truth<s%> and outside <S%H5766>iniquity<s%>, <S%H6662>just<s%> and right is <S%H3477>he<s%>.
They have <S%H7843>corrupted<s%> <S%H3971>themselves<s%>, their spot is not the spot of his <S%H1121>sons<s%>: they are a <S%H6141>perverse<s%> and <S%H6618>crooked<s%> <S%H1755>generation<s%>.

Do you thus <S%H1580>requite<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, O <S%H5036>foolish<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> and <S%H2450>unwise<s%>? is not he your <S%H1>father<s%> that has <S%H7069>bought<s%> you has he not <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H3559>you<s%>, and established you

<S%H2142>Remember<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5769>old<s%>, <S%H995>consider<s%> the <S%H8141>years<s%> of <S%H1755>many<s%> <S%H1755>generations<s%>: <S%H7592>ask<s%> your <S%H1>father<s%>, and he will <S%H5046>show<s%> <S%H2205>you<s%>; your elders, and they will tell <S%H559>you<s%>.

When the most <S%H5945>High<s%> <S%H5157>divided<s%> to the <S%H1471>nations<s%> their <S%H5157>inheritance<s%>, when he <S%H6504>separated<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>Adam<s%>, he <S%H5324>set<s%> the <S%H1367>bounds<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>'s <S%H2506>portion<s%> is his <S%H5971>people<s%>; <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> is the <S%H2256>lot<s%> of his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>.

He <S%H4672>found<s%> him in a <S%H4057>desert<s%> <S%H776>land<s%>, and in the <S%H8414>waste<s%> <S%H3214>howling<s%> <S%H3452>wilderness<s%>; he led him <S%H5437>about<s%>, he <S%H995>instructed<s%> <S%H5341>him<s%>, he kept him as the <S%H380>apple<s%> of his <S%H5869>eye<s%>.

As an <S%H5404>eagle<s%> stirs <S%H5782>up<s%> her <S%H7064>nest<s%>, <S%H7363>flutters<s%> over her <S%H1469>young<s%>, spreads <S%H6566>abroad<s%> her <S%H3671>wings<s%>, <S%H3947>takes<s%> <S%H5375>them<s%>, bears them on her <S%H84>wings<s%>:
So the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H910>alone<s%> did <S%H5148>lead<s%> <S%H5236>him<s%>, and there was no strange god with <S%H410>him<s%>.

He made him <S%H7392>ride<s%> on the high <S%H1116>places<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, that he might <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H8570>increase<s%> of the <S%H7704>fields<s%>; and he made him to <S%H3243>suck<s%> <S%H1706>honey<s%> out of the <S%H5553>rock<s%>, and <S%H8081>oil<s%> out of the <S%H2496>flinty<s%> <S%H6697>rock<s%>;

<S%H2529>Butter<s%> of <S%H1241>cows<s%>, and <S%H2461>milk<s%> of <S%H6629>sheep<s%>, with <S%H2459>fat<s%> of <S%H3733>lambs<s%>, and <S%H352>rams<s%> of the <S%H1121>breed<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>, and <S%H6260>goats<s%>, with the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of <S%H3629>kidneys<s%> of <S%H2406>wheat<s%>; and you did <S%H8354>drink<s%> the <S%H2561>pure<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H6025>grape<s%>.

But <S%H3484>Jeshurun<s%> grew <S%H8080>fat<s%>, and <S%H1163>kicked<s%>: you are grown <S%H8080>fat<s%>, you are grown <S%H5666>thick<s%>, you are <S%H3780>covered<s%> with <S%H5203>fatness<s%>; then he forsook <S%H433>God<s%> which <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H5034>him<s%>, and lightly esteemed the <S%H6697>Rock<s%> of his <S%H3444>salvation<s%>.
They provoked him to <S%H7065>jealousy<s%> with <S%H2114>strange<s%> <S%H8441>gods<s%>, with abominations provoked they him to <S%H3707>anger<s%>.

They <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> unto <S%H7700>demons<s%>, not to <S%H433>God<s%>; to <S%H430>gods<s%> whom they <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H2319>not<s%>, to new gods that <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H7138>newly<s%> <S%H935>up<s%>, whom your <S%H1>fathers<s%> feared <S%H8175>not<s%>.
Of the <S%H6697>Rock<s%> that <S%H3205>fathered<s%> you you are <S%H7876>unmindful<s%>, and have <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> that formed <S%H2342>you<s%>.
And when the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H5006>it<s%>, he abhorred <S%H3708>them<s%>, because of the provoking of his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and of his <S%H1323>daughters<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, I will <S%H5641>hide<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> from <S%H7200>them<s%>, I will see what their <S%H319>end<s%> shall <S%H8419>be<s%>: for they are a very perverse <S%H1755>generation<s%>, <S%H1121>sons<s%> in whom is no <S%H529>faith<s%>.

They have moved me to <S%H7065>jealousy<s%> with that which is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H410>God<s%>; they have provoked me to <S%H3707>anger<s%> with their <S%H1892>vanities<s%>: and I will move them to <S%H7065>jealousy<s%> with those which are not a <S%H5971>people<s%>; I will provoke them to <S%H3707>anger<s%> with a <S%H5036>foolish<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%>.

For a <S%H784>fire<s%> is <S%H6919>kindled<s%> in my <S%H639>anger<s%>, and shall <S%H3344>burn<s%> unto the <S%H8482>lowest<s%> <S%H7585>hell<s%>, and shall <S%H398>consume<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> with her <S%H2981>increase<s%>, and set on <S%H3857>fire<s%> the <S%H4144>foundations<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>.
I will <S%H5595>heap<s%> <S%H7451>mischiefs<s%> upon <S%H3615>them<s%>; I will spend my arrows upon <S%H2671>them<s%>.

They shall be <S%H4198>burnt<s%> with <S%H7458>hunger<s%>, and <S%H3898>devoured<s%> with burning <S%H7565>heat<s%>, and with <S%H4815>bitter<s%> <S%H6986>destruction<s%>: I will also <S%H7971>send<s%> the <S%H8127>teeth<s%> of <S%H929>animals<s%> upon <S%H2534>them<s%>, with the poison of <S%H2119>serpents<s%> of the <S%H6083>dust<s%>.

The <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H2351>outside<s%>, and <S%H367>terror<s%> <S%H2315>inside<s%>, shall <S%H7921>destroy<s%> both the young <S%H970>man<s%> and the <S%H1330>virgin<s%>, the <S%H3243>suckling<s%> also with the <S%H376>man<s%> of gray <S%H7872>hairs<s%>.
I <S%H559>said<s%>, I would scatter them into <S%H6284>corners<s%>, I would make the <S%H2143>memory<s%> of them to <S%H7673>cease<s%> from among <S%H582>men<s%>:

Were it <S%H3884>not<s%> that I <S%H1481>feared<s%> the <S%H3708>wrath<s%> of the <S%H341>enemy<s%>, lest their <S%H6862>adversaries<s%> should behave themselves <S%H5234>strangely<s%>, and lest they should <S%H559>say<s%>, Our <S%H3027>hand<s%> is <S%H7311>high<s%>, and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has not done all <S%H6466>this<s%>.
For they are a <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H6>void<s%> of <S%H6098>counsel<s%>, neither is there any understanding in <S%H8394>them<s%>.
O <S%H3863>that<s%> they were <S%H2449>wise<s%>, that they <S%H7919>understood<s%> <S%H995>this<s%>, that they would consider their latter <S%H319>end<s%>!

How should <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7291>chase<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%>, and <S%H8147>two<s%> put <S%H7233>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> to <S%H5127>flight<s%>, <S%H3808>except<s%> their <S%H6697>Rock<s%> had <S%H4376>sold<s%> <S%H3588>them<s%>, and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had shut them <S%H5462>up<s%>?
For their <S%H6697>rock<s%> is not as our <S%H6697>Rock<s%>, even our <S%H341>enemies<s%> themselves being <S%H6414>judges<s%>.

For their <S%H1612>vine<s%> is of the <S%H1612>vine<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%>, and of the <S%H7709>fields<s%> of <S%H6017>Gomorrah<s%>: their <S%H6025>grapes<s%> are <S%H6025>grapes<s%> of <S%H7219>gall<s%>, their <S%H811>clusters<s%> are <S%H4846>bitter<s%>:
Their <S%H3196>wine<s%> is the <S%H2534>poison<s%> of <S%H8577>dragons<s%>, and the <S%H393>cruel<s%> <S%H7219>venom<s%> of <S%H6620>asps<s%>.
Is not this laid up in <S%H3647>store<s%> with <S%H2856>me<s%>, and sealed up among my <S%H214>treasures<s%>?

To me belongs <S%H5359>vengeance<s%>, and <S%H8005>recompence<s%>; their <S%H7272>foot<s%> shall <S%H4131>slide<s%> in due <S%H6256>time<s%>: for the <S%H3117>day<s%> of their <S%H343>calamity<s%> is at <S%H7138>hand<s%>, and the things that shall <S%H6264>come<s%> upon them make <S%H2363>hurry<s%>.

For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H1777>judge<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%>, and <S%H5162>repent<s%> himself for his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, when he <S%H7200>sees<s%> that their <S%H3027>power<s%> is <S%H235>gone<s%>, and there is <S%H657>none<s%> shut <S%H6113>up<s%>, or <S%H5800>left<s%>.
And he shall <S%H559>say<s%>, Where are their <S%H430>gods<s%>, their <S%H6697>rock<s%> in whom they <S%H2620>trusted<s%>,

Which did <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of their <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%>, and <S%H8354>drank<s%> the <S%H3196>wine<s%> of their drink <S%H5257>offerings<s%>? let them rise <S%H6965>up<s%> and <S%H5826>help<s%> <S%H5643>you<s%>, and be your protection.

<S%H7200>See<s%> now that <S%H430>I<s%>, even I, am he, and there is no god with <S%H4191>me<s%>: I kill, and I make <S%H2421>alive<s%>; I <S%H4272>wound<s%>, and I <S%H7495>heal<s%>: neither is there any that can <S%H5337>deliver<s%> out of my <S%H3027>hand<s%>.
For I lift <S%H5375>up<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> to <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%>, I <S%H2416>live<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.

If I <S%H8150>whet<s%> my <S%H1300>glittering<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and my <S%H3027>hand<s%> take <S%H270>hold<s%> on <S%H4941>judgment<s%>; I will <S%H7725>render<s%> <S%H5359>vengeance<s%> to my <S%H6862>enemies<s%>, and will <S%H7999>reward<s%> them that hate <S%H8130>me<s%>.

I will make my <S%H2671>arrows<s%> <S%H7937>drunk<s%> with <S%H1818>blood<s%>, and my <S%H2719>sword<s%> shall <S%H398>devour<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%>; and that with the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H2491>slain<s%> and of the <S%H7633>captives<s%>, from the <S%H7218>beginning<s%> of <S%H6546>revenges<s%> upon the <S%H341>enemy<s%>.

<S%H7442>Rejoice<s%>, O you <S%H1471>nations<s%>, with his <S%H5971>people<s%>: for he will <S%H5358>avenge<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, and will <S%H7725>render<s%> <S%H5359>vengeance<s%> to his <S%H6862>adversaries<s%>, and will be <S%H3722>merciful<s%> unto his <S%H127>land<s%>, and to his <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> all the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H7892>song<s%> in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H1954>he<s%>, and Hoshea the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%>.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H1696>speaking<s%> all these <S%H1697>words<s%> to all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>:

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7760>them<s%>, Set your <S%H3824>hearts<s%> unto all the <S%H1697>words<s%> which I <S%H5749>testify<s%> among you this <S%H3117>day<s%>, which you shall <S%H6680>command<s%> your <S%H1121>sons<s%> to <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%>, all the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H8451>law<s%>.

For it is not a <S%H7386>vain<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> for <S%H2416>you<s%>; because it is your life: and through this <S%H1697>thing<s%> you shall <S%H748>prolong<s%> your <S%H3117>days<s%> in the <S%H127>land<s%>, where you go <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> to possess <S%H3423>it<s%>.
And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%> that <S%H6106>same<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Get you <S%H5927>up<s%> into this <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H5682>Abarim<s%>, unto <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H5015>Nebo<s%>, which is in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, that is over <S%H6440>against<s%> <S%H3405>Jericho<s%>; and <S%H7200>behold<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, which I <S%H5414>give<s%> unto the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for a <S%H272>possession<s%>:

And <S%H4191>die<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> where you go <S%H5927>up<s%>, and be <S%H622>gathered<s%> unto your <S%H5971>people<s%>; as <S%H175>Aaron<s%> your <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> in <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H2023>Hor<s%>, and was <S%H622>gathered<s%> unto his <S%H5971>people<s%>:

Because you <S%H4603>trespassed<s%> against me <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> at the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4808>Meribah<s%>–Kadesh, in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6790>Zin<s%>; because you <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> me not in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

Yet you shall <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> before <S%H935>you<s%>; but you shall not go there unto the <S%H776>land<s%> which I <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
